reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' to appear in the list.
Check the 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' check box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Some required modules must be enabled'.
Switch back to the 'Modules' frame.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform MPX Status (BETA)' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
STEP 4
Verify the text 'Total Videos Ingested:' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'View all videos here.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Total Players Ingested:' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'View all players here.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Videos Updated Last Cron' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Players Updated Last Cron' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Total Videos Queued for Ingestion' is present on the page.
STEP 5
Verify the text 'Successfully signed into account "DB TV" (2312945284).' is present on the page.
Click the 'VIDEO UPDATES TO BE PROCESSED DURING THE NEXT CRON RUN' link.
STEP 6
Note the 'Total Videos Ingested' count which is '129'.
Note the 'Total Players Ingested' count which is '66'.
Note the 'Total Videos Queued for Ingestion' count which is '0'.
Note the 'Videos Updated Last Cron' count which is '0'.
Note the 'Total Video Updates Waiting to be Processed' count which is '10'.
STEP 1
Open url 'http://update.qa5.nbcupublisher7.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Modules' menu link.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Enter 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' in the 'Filter Name' text box.
Wait for the module titled 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' to appear in the list.
Check the 'Media: ThePlatform mpx Reports' check box.
Click the 'Save configuration' button.
Switch to frame titled 'Some required modules must be enabled'.
Switch back to the 'Modules' frame.
Switch to frame titled 'Modules'.
Verify success message of 'The configuration options have been saved.' is present.
Click the 'Close Overlay X'.
STEP 3
Mouse over the 'Configuration' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media' menu link.
Mouse over the 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings' menu link.
Click the 'Media: thePlatform MPX Status (BETA)' menu link.
Switch to the active frame titled 'Media: thePlatform mpx settings dialog'.
STEP 4
Verify the text 'Total Videos Ingested:' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'View all videos here.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Total Players Ingested:' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'View all players here.' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Videos Updated Last Cron' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Players Updated Last Cron' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Total Videos Queued for Ingestion' is present on the page.
STEP 5
Verify the text 'Successfully signed into account "DB TV" (2312945284).' is present on the page.
Click the 'VIDEO UPDATES TO BE PROCESSED DURING THE NEXT CRON RUN' link.
STEP 6
Note the 'Total Videos Ingested' count which is '129'.
Note the 'Total Players Ingested' count which is '66'.
Note the 'Total Videos Queued for Ingestion' count which is '0'.
Note the 'Videos Updated Last Cron' count which is '0'.
Note the 'Total Video Updates Waiting to be Processed' count which is '10'.
